title: B5 support/adc main needing coach/mentor
body:
I'm a b5 Support and adc main that really wants to try and improve and climb the ranks... I do listen to any advice given and would appreciate all the help I can get.

IGN: xnoticemesenpaix

replies.body:
Hi :) i'd be happy to watch some of your games but I'll probably be playing solo q if i have a duo online. Also I'm not very experienced but I'll try my best!
Care with the accent in my IGN: TPS PUNGUïN

Hi,

I op.gg'd your account and it says you're level 0. 

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=xnoticemesenpaix

What's the go? This an alternate account?

just watch videos from people like Phylol and stuff and play a lot of different adc's to figure out whether you like crit/attack speed adc's like jinx and cait or caster adc's like jhin and lucian. in all seriousness though, climbing really doesn't matter unless you're gonna put the time in to make it to mid gold or higher. i was in bronze 5 too and made it my mission to get to silver and it's no different.
